status_focus_1.name: Focus
status_focus_1.desc: Enhance the hit rate and evade rate by 30% on oneself.

status_focus_2.name: Clarity
status_focus_2.desc: Enhance the hit rate and evade rate by 30% to the target.

status_poison_1.name: Poison bite
status_poison_1.desc: Bite into the skin. Cause the foe to get poisoned.
